message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this valuable product with you. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business. As we start our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $800000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's worth to you is $1200000. I'm open to further discussion and willing to work together to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your initial offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think $800000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1200000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $900000. I'm willing to compromise and offer you a price of $950000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $1200000. I'm open to further discussion and willing to work together to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I'm still not comfortable with the price of $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $975000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1200000. I'm willing to compromise to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $975000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you a price of $990000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's worth to you is $1200000. I'm open to further discussion, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $990000. I'm willing to make a final offer of $995000. I think this is the highest price I'm willing to pay, considering the product's worth to me is $1200000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to make a last attempt to reach an agreement. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $995000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you a price of $998000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's worth to you is $1200000. If we can't come to an agreement at this point, I'm willing to consider other offers.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $998000. I'm willing to make a final counteroffer of $999000. I think this is the highest price I'm willing to pay, considering the product's worth to me is $1200000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your final counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $999000. I've made significant concessions, and I'm at my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to walk away from the deal if we can't come to an agreement. I'm considering other offers, including one from John for $1000000. I'll give you one last chance to meet me at $999500. This is my final offer.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $999500. I've already offered $995000, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I think we've reached an impasse. I'm going to have to consider other options, including buying the product from John for $1200000.
